pullRequest.title: Fix search devices result according to the device registry management spec
pullRequest.bodyText: The search devices result has now fixed to align with the OpenAPI spec. For more info #2138 (comment)

commit.message:
Fix search devices result according to the spec

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

nodes.bodyText: I am pretty sure that we will re-use these constants for searching tenants and/or credentials. How about naming them more generically, e.g. FIELD_RESULT_SET_SIZE and FIELD_RESULT_SET_PAGE?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -124,6 +124,17 @@
      */
     public static final String PARAM_SORT_JSON = "sortJson";
 
+    /**
+     * The name of the field that contains the total number of objects in the result set of the search devices
+     * operation.
+     */
+    public static final String FIELD_SEARCH_DEVICES_RESULT_TOTAL = "total";
+
+    /**
+     * The name of the field that contains the result of the search devices operation.
+     */
+    public static final String FIELD_SEARCH_DEVICES_RESULT = "result";

commit.message:
Rename the constants used for searching devices more generically and improve a test

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>
